queries.querystring: select distinct r.*,count(v.dbn_repv_viewname) Views_Used, min(e.Ref_Status) Extr_Status from dbn_report r, dbn_report_views v, dbn_entities e where (v.dbn_repv_viewname = e.ViewName) and (v.dbn_repv_parid = r.dbn_rep_id) and r.dbn_rep_id ='pRID'

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(dates.date_field, '%Y-%m-%d') 'DATE_FIELD' , ifnull(assets_planned,0) + ifnull(assets_abroad,0) 'ASSETS_PLAN' , assets_count 'ASSETS_THEO' , if((assets_count - ifnull(assets_NONOPS,0))<avg_ops.yearly_opscount,(assets_count - ifnull(assets_NONOPS,0)),avg_ops.yearly_opscount) 'ASSETS_OPS' , (assets_count - ifnull(assets_PPM,0)) 'ASSETS_REAL'
FROM ( select date_field, date_tk from damrsysl_calendar_dates where date_field >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND date_field <= DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL pINTERVAL DAY) ) dates left join ( SELECT date_field, date_tk , COUNT(ASSET) AS assets_count FROM mrqr_assets ma, damrsysl_calendar_dates WHERE ma.HIGHER_ASSET IS NULL and ma.function like 'pFUNCTION' AND ma.STATUS NOT IN('D','A','B','E','O') AND (ma.STORE NOT LIKE('%VE') OR ma.STORE IS NULL) AND date_field >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND date_field <= DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL pINTERVAL DAY) AND MFRDATE <= date_field AND ma.organism like 'pORGANISM' GROUP BY date_tk ) exist_sum on dates.date_tk=exist_sum.date_tk
left join ( SELECT date_field, date_tk , COUNT(ASSET) AS assets_abroad FROM mrqr_assets ma inner join mrqr_organisms mo on ma.organism=mo.organism , damrsysl_calendar_dates WHERE ma.HIGHER_ASSET IS NULL and ma.function like 'pFUNCTION' AND ma.STATUS NOT IN('D','A','B','E','O') AND (ma.STORE NOT LIKE('%VE') OR ma.STORE IS NULL) AND mo.parent='0Z' AND date_field >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND date_field <= DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL pINTERVAL DAY) AND MFRDATE <= date_field AND ma.organism like 'pORGANISM' GROUP BY date_tk ) deployed_sum on dates.date_tk=deployed_sum.date_tk
left join ( SELECT date_field, date_tk , sum(mum.nbr_of_assets) AS assets_planned from mrqr_mission_units_material mum INNER JOIN mrqr_mission_participating_units mpu on mum.omu_id=mpu.omu_id, damrsysl_calendar_dates WHERE mum.function like 'pFUNCTION' AND date_field >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND date_field < DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL pINTERVAL DAY) AND date_field >= mpu.start_date AND date_field < mpu.end_date
AND mpu.PARTICIPATING_UNIT like 'pORGANISM'
GROUP BY date_tk
) plan_sum on plan_sum.date_tk=dates.date_tk
left join
( SELECT date_tk, AVG(opscount) AS yearly_opscount FROM (SELECT mrqr_assets.function , date_tk , COUNT(mrqr_assets.ASSET) AS opscount FROM mrqr_assets inner join daotg4_functions_global on mrqr_assets.nsn=daotg4_functions_global.nsn and mrqr_assets.function=daotg4_functions_global.function INNER JOIN mrqr_aosac_intervals ON mrqr_assets.ASSET=mrqr_aosac_intervals.ASSET ,damrsysl_calendar_dates
WHERE daotg4_functions_global.top=1 AND mrqr_assets.STATUS NOT IN('D','A','B','E','O') AND (mrqr_assets.STORE NOT LIKE('%VE') OR mrqr_assets.STORE IS NULL) AND mrqr_aosac_intervals.STATUS IN ('O','Q') AND ADDTIME(date_field, '09:00:00.0') >= STARTDATE AND ADDTIME(date_field, '09:00:00.0') < ENDDATE AND date_field >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AND date_field < CURRENT_DATE and mrqr_assets.function='pFUNCTION' GROUP BY function, date_tk)yearly_sub GROUP BY function
)avg_ops on left(avg_ops.date_tk,1)=left(dates.date_tk,1)
left join ( select date_field, date_tk , ifnull(COUNT(distinct marp.ASSET),0) AS assets_PPM FROM mrqr_assets_remaining_potential marp inner join mrqr_assets ma on marp.asset=ma.asset inner join mrqr_ppms mp on marp.ppm=mp.ppm , damrsysl_calendar_dates WHERE ma.HIGHER_ASSET IS NULL and ma.function like 'pFUNCTION' and marp.meter='CD' AND ma.STATUS NOT IN('D','A','B','E','O') AND (ma.STORE NOT LIKE('%VE') OR ma.STORE IS NULL) AND date_field >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND date_field <= DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL pINTERVAL DAY) AND date_field >= DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL marp.remaining_potential DAY) AND date_field <= DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL marp.remaining_potential+mp.duration DAY) AND ma.organism like 'pORGANISM'
GROUP BY date_tk ) ppm_sum on dates.date_tk=ppm_sum.date_tk
left join ( select date_field, date_tk , ifnull(COUNT(maol.ASSET),0) AS assets_NONOPS FROM mrqr_assets_ops_status_last maol inner join mrqr_assets ma on maol.asset=ma.asset
left join ( select ma.asset , avg(IMMOBILISATION) avg_immob FROM mrqr_work mw inner join mrqr_assets ma on ma.asset=mw.asset where not(mw.ops_status_top='O' ) and not(mw.ops_status_top is null) and ma.function like 'pFUNCTION' group by asset )immob on immob.asset=maol.asset
, damrsysl_calendar_dates
WHERE ma.HIGHER_ASSET IS NULL and ma.function like 'pFUNCTION' and not(maol.status='O') AND ma.STATUS NOT IN('D','A','B','E','O') AND (ma.STORE NOT LIKE('%VE') OR ma.STORE IS NULL) AND date_field >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND date_field <= DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL pINTERVAL DAY) AND date_field >= maol.statusdate AND date_field <= DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL immob.avg_immob HOUR) AND ma.organism like 'pORGANISM'
GROUP BY date_tk ) inops_sum on dates.date_tk=inops_sum.date_tk
WHERE (length(replace(replace('pFUNCTION','%',''),'_',''))>=2
)
